description: Nobody knows what it is. Some say it's a modified GT-R. Others say it's something that was never meant to leave a factory. The Ghost doesn't talk and the car has no badges. No VIN, no markings, no history. Just speed.
lore: Nobody knows what it is. Some say it's a modified GT-R. Others say it's something that was never meant to leave a factory. The Ghost doesn't talk and the car has no badges. You'll only find out if you can catch it. And nobody catches the Ghost.
